name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior .NET Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specifically within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET**, and **T-SQL**, and skilled in **SQL Server** and **XML** for robust backend solutions. Strong understanding of **web services** and **3rd party integrations**, including **Salesforce**, **Oracle**, **SAP**, **PeopleSoft**, and **Siebel**. Experienced in ensuring compliance with industry standards while engaging in technical problem solving and performance tuning.

Demonstrated ability in leveraging **JavaScript** for frontend development alongside frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Background in deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing microservices and event-driven architectures. Proficient in building AI/ML-powered platforms with **Python** and **Flutter**, enabling automation and real-time analytics. Strong capabilities in unit testing and ensuring code quality. Excellent communication and analytical skills, established through years of cross-functional collaboration.
